page.title: 17Employment, N. Lopham
page.content: Jobs can be more difficult to find in a village. There is also a smaller choice of jobs. We did a small survey about work. We asked parents of children at N. Lopham school about their jobs and found that, at least, there was no unemployment for our children's fathers - every one had a job. When we asked mothers, just over 1/3 worked, but of these only 1 had full time employment and the rest were part time. Jobs for fathers included: computer programmer, H.G.V. driver, granary worker, master mariner, sales representative, head pigman. Jobs for mothers included: domestic cleaner, home helper, insurance clerk, typist, shop assistant, general assistant in pub, teacher.
